channel.title: Armour set help
channel.description: hey i have a server and it has armour sets but i need to no how to open them or a code that opens them because when i try a chisel on them or the armour set on the chisel it doesnt open can any 1 tell me how to like activate them so they open up into armour sets i would really appricate it if you help thanks :)

item.title: Armour set help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

[quote=“mad_moparscapian, post:4, topic:273782”][quote author=mad_moparscapian link=topic=361803.msg2750609#msg2750609 date=1239889777]

[quote]public void [b][armour set name here]b
{
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
deleteItem(@@@@, getItemSlot(@@@@), 1);
sendMessage(“You get the armour out of its set”);
}[/quote]

[/quote]

And You Need To Delete The [ ]. (In The Bolded Bit)

I just wrote it up so i hope it work’s took me bout 3 minutes.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Armour set help
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

[quote=“mad_moparscapian, post:2, topic:273782”][quote]public void armour set name here
{
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
addItem(####, 1);
deleteItem(@@@@, getItemSlot(@@@@), 1);
sendMessage(“You get the armour out of its set”);
}[/quote][/quote]

I just wrote it up so i hope it work’s took me bout 3 minutes.

item.title: Armour set help
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

public void [armour set name here]() { addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); addItem(####, 1); deleteItem(@@@@, getItemSlot(@@@@), 1); sendMessage("You get the armour out of its set"); }

@@@@ = box set id

= id of items you get.

This should work
any problems post here

Read full topic
